sense.def:
Reins
so usnjeni trakovi, pritrjeni na uzdo, s katerimi vodimo konja.

To give free rein to someone, or to one's feelings or thoughts
pomeni pustiti veliko svobode človeku, svojim čustvom ali mislim.

cit.quote: pustiti proste roke, dati prosto pot

seg.quote: They were encouraged to give free rein to their feelings.

sense.def:
To keep a tight rein on someone
pomeni strogo nadzorovati, kar nekdo dela.
